title: Learning Experience Design (LXD) Competency Enhancement: Participatory Education Design Based on Digital Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Corporate Training Program Management Experience
context.additional_context: Course for science field managers/leaders focusing on designing learner-engagement digital platforms.

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to create digital educational content by applying the Learning Experience Design (LXD) process and User Experience (UX) design principles
Strengthening the competency to design data-driven user analysis and feedback systems for enhancing learner engagement
Acquiring the ability to develop and evaluate interactive learning modules that systematically convey scientific concepts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
